Beliefs & Emotions
  • Ztree Summary
  • CM Sessions
    • Beliefs Stage - Emotions Summary
    • Regressions - Period beliefs as a function of Period and Market trends (without emotions)
    • Beliefs as a function of fundamental value
    • Long term beliefs using record stage emotions of t-1
    • Short term beliefs using record stage emotions of t-1
    • b(t) - b(t-1) regression
    • Period beliefs as a function of Period and Market trends (with record stage emotions of t-1)
    • Relationship between predicted and actual price change between periods t-1 and t - including record stage emotions of t-1
    • Average short turm belief and prior market emotions
    • Average prices and prior market emotions
    • Percision in beliefs as a function of subjects’ average emotions (in t-1 record stage)
    • b(t) - P(t-1)
    • Record Stage - Emotions Summary
    • Regressions - Total dividends received as a function of subjects' average emotions (traders only)
    • Regression - Protfolio value as a function of subjects' average emotions (Traders only)
  • CDA Sessions
    • Regressions - Period beliefs as a function of Period and Market trends (without emotions)
    • Period beliefs as a function of Period and Market trends (with record stage emotions of t-1)
  • Backups
    • b(t) - b(t-1) regression
    • Regressions - Percision in beliefs as a function of subjects' average emotions

Regressions - Percision in beliefs as a function of subjects’ average emotions

\(Y_{i,t} = C_{i} + \beta_1Neutrality_{i,t} + \beta_2Happiness_{i,t} + \beta_3Sadness_{i,t} + \beta_4Anger_{i,t} + \beta_5Surprise_{i,t} + \beta_6Fear_{i,t} + \beta_7Disgust_{i,t}\) (Fixed effects regression model)

\(Y_{i,t} = |\frac{Belief_{i,t,k=0}-Price_{t}}{Price_{t}}|\) (only 1 period percision).

Each emotion is averaged over 10 s’, during record stage in period t, per each subject.

1 All sessions – combined
